description: Cancer-Related Single Base Substitution Signatures (GRCh38). 96 channels represent trinucleotide contexts
Cancer-Related Doublet Base Substitution Signatures (GRCh38).  78 channels represent doublet substitutions such as AA>NN or CC>NN
Cancer-Related Indel Signatures (GRCh37). 83 channels represent different indel sizes, nucleotides affected and presence on repetitive and/or microhomology regions
Cancer-Related CopyNumber Signatures (GRCh37). 48 channels represent different loss-of-heterozygosity status, total copy number state, and segment length
Cancer-Related Single Base Substitution Signatures (GRCh37). 96 channels represent trinucleotide contexts
Cancer-Related Doublet Base Substitution Signatures (GRCh37).  78 channels represent doublet substitutions such as AA>NN or CC>NN
